text: Any person who knowingly and willfully violates any rule or regulation prescribed under this subchapter shall be guilty of a misdemeanor, and shall be fined not more than $500 or imprisoned not more than 6 months or both.

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Protection of Property Outside of District.

heading.catch_text: Penalty for violation of rules and regulations.
